segment.target: Nothing to report
The zone has been explored, nothing to report.{always_successful_thanks_to_skill}{fight_prevented_by_item}
The landing went exactly as planned. Nothing to report!
The trees in this zone contain no fruit, it would seem as though you've arrived in the wrong season!
Apart from the winds tearing across the plains, there is not a damn thing happening in this zone.
Apart from the biting cold which is freezing your fingers and toes, there's not much of interest in this zone... Brrrr...
This swamp is incredibly calm... Nothing to report in the vicinity.
You spotted a dangerous Skinner. The creature wanders around nearby for a while, but decided not to attack in the end... Phew!
Nothing to report in this zone, apart from the three *#@µ% suns which have been wrecking expeditions since... err... When was the morning again?
A large volcano sits imposingly in the middle of the zone, at your current altitude, clouds of vapor punctuate the landscape. The smell of sulphur scorches your nostrils...
Surprisingly enough, this desert wasteland contains absolutely nothing with which to improve your situation.
Violent winds are moving the ocean. Perfect weather for a spot of surfing, but you have to save humanity instead...
The {equipment} oxygen pump is jammed, there's nothing coming through!
This planet's soil is scarred with crevasses... That's not a good sign...
For several hours, you wander around the ruined city without finding anything even slightly interesting.
The wreck is totally empty... How disappointing!
A loud scream. A moment of panic. Then nothing...
A loud scream. A moment of panic. Then nothing...
A loud scream. A moment of panic. Then nothing...
A loud scream. A moment of panic. Then nothing...
A loud scream. A moment of panic. Then nothing...
A loud scream. A moment of panic. Then nothing...
A loud scream. A moment of panic. Then nothing...
A loud scream. A moment of panic. Then nothing...
Fatigue
The landing is difficult, {equipment} turns and shocks violently, the crew is sick.
The cold is slowing your progression more and more. Members of the team are freezing up!
There is a stifling heat here, the team members are sweating buckets!
After two hours marching in slime, you can't take it anymore. Don't even let us get started on the parasites. And the heat. And the humidity. And the screaming...
The expedition has turned into a climbing lesson, the team is exhausted.
To advance, the team must march against a violent wind, which is slowing their progress considerably.
Marching in this desert wasteland is tough, not to mention painful.
Accident
A team member sustains {min_quantity} to {max_quantity} points of damage.{rope_worked, select, true {////Dodged Rope} other {}}{fight_prevented_by_item}
A savage Skinner attacked {character}... You manage to scare it and the creature ran off, but {character} was seriously wounded!
{character} falls off a small ledge and lands 4 metres below... Ouch !
When a normally docile Chew Chew enters the mix, the creature rushes {character} violently and seriously injures them before fleeing...
A giant centipede just fell out of a tree onto {character}. {character} managed to fight it off, but not before it could begin its meal...
Jumping to avoid a passing alien scorpion, {character} split their head open on a stalactite.
{character} fell into a crevasse... Aaaargh!
A ruined arch collapses on {character}!
{character}'s arm is frozen, which seems to be causing them a lot of pain... there's a good chance we'll have to cut it off!
{character} collapsed from heatstroke.
{equipment} has a catastrophic landing on {planet}, and during the manoeuvre, {character} got hurt!
Catastrophe
All team members have sustained {min_quantity} to {max_quantity} points of damage.{fight_prevented_by_item}
{equipment} crashed to earth on {planet}. The crew has been knocked out.
Pump
You have gained {quantity} units of O².{fight_prevented_by_item}
Hydrocarbon Deposits
You have earned {quantity} units of Fuel.{has_drill, select, true {////This has been increased by x2 because the expedition team has the Drill} other {}}{fight_prevented_by_item}
You find a gelatinous carbonite vine... The reactor should be able to digest that!
{character} springs off blocks of carbonite the size of your fist, cool!
By siphoning the wreck's tank, you manage to recover {quantity} units of fuel.
Artefact
You have found an artefact. {used_babel_module, select, true {////+100% Babel Module} other {}}{fight_prevented_by_item}
In the depths of the grotto, you find a small chest containing a really unusual object...
You have discovered a Mankarog's lair. During the search around its larder which is about the size of an 8 storey building, you manage to find an alien artefact!
In the middle of the ruins of the largest building in the city you find an intact alien artefact!
The wreck contains a strange alien artifact... Well snatched!
Always succeeds because the expedition team has the skill: {skill}.
Combat avoided because the expedition team has {equipment}
{character} suffers {quantity} less damage thanks to their skill: {skill}
This was increased by + {quantity} because the expedition team has the skill: {skill}
Probability of combat cancelled {skill}
Death
A team member has died.{fight_prevented_by_item}
A crack opens in the earth right below the expedition crew!!! {character} slips and disappears into the void!
While climbing up a small hill, you realize that in fact it's a Mankarog's left buttock... As it swings round its massive hand to scratch it, it crushes {character} in an instant.
Group death
All team members have died.{fight_prevented_by_item}
As the closest mountain begins to spew a 500m jet of lava into the air, the earth gives way beneath the feet of the expedition crew and swallows them in a pit of flames.
Fight
You are facing off against a creature.////Creature Strength: {creature_strength}////Team Strength: {expedition_strength}////{damage, select, 0 {Creature dies.} other {Team takes {damage} damage.}}
A strange being approaches and shrieks piercingly enough to make your ears ache. You'll have to find a way to stop it.
While trying to sneak up on an unsuspecting Chew Chew, you quickly find yourself surrounded by its kin... You're going to have to fight your way out of this one!
You feel like you're being watched. A hostile, hungry Skinner is studying you... Your team starts to run, but the creature pounces on you!
While walking along the bottom of a crevasse, you see a predatory Beetlethug emerge... You'll have to defend yourself!
A gigantic shadow suddenly appears over the expedition crew... And it's not a cloud...
A gigantic shadow suddenly appears over the expedition crew... And it's not a cloud...
It would appear that the pilot of the vessel is still alive! It's quite apparent that they don't consider you their saviour...
The fields are deserted... A sinister howl deafens you... It's a savage Mindblender! There are no words to describe this creature that came from a land with no light or warmth. Man your weapons!
Provision
You have earned {quantity, plural, one {# {equipment}} other {# {equipment_plural_name}}}.{fight_prevented_by_item}
Using a rudimentary fishing line, you manage to catch an Empilodon. Good skills.
You come across a deadly Skinner. The creature is immobilized, semmingly asleep. You take advantage of this to settle the score, and snag some rations of meat!

During an otherwise peaceful expedition, you suddenly find yourself face to face with a strange being. Although effective communication was impossible, upon leaving you are given a bag containing some of the spoils of an alien big-game hunt.
{character} noticed some huge moths nearby with huge juicy abdomens... Mmmmh!
Harvest
You have earned {quantity, plural, one {# Alien fruit} other {# Alien fruits}}.{fight_prevented_by_item}
You have found {quantity, plural, one {# fruit} other {# fruits}} which look delicious. Best to take them back to the ship and analyze them before eating them though...
The swamp is full of huge roots upon which strange fruits are growing. You decide to take some back with you.
At the top of a rocky summit, you notice a small tree with unusual berries. You decide to take some back with you.
You discover an incredibly fertile zone where plants you have never seen before are growing. After neutralizing the ones that are trying to eat you, you can harvest the others!
Illness
A member of the team has fallen ill.{fight_prevented_by_item}
A creeping vine brushed past {character}'s cheek.
After an hour of marching in the sludge, you lose count of the strange leeches stuck to your calves, which must have pumped a good half litre of blood out by now.
Suddenly {character} starts screaming, and a huge glowing spider shoots out of their suit. NOBODY wants spiders scuttling around their suit!
Map fragment
You find 1 fragment of the Cristalite Starmap.{fight_prevented_by_item}
This cristalite field is highly active. In the centre of the main atrium, a shard floating in metallic liquid is causing light beams of unknown colours to converge. Nice, let's take it.
Mush trap
All team members risk becoming infected by the Mush.{fight_prevented_by_item}
This place has been visited recently. You keep going but... the smell of decay hits your nostrils, pink vapour chokes you, it's a trap! Flee! The Mush is here already!
Wander
Zone exploration failure. There are still things to be discovered...{fight_prevented_by_item}
This walk in the desert is totally pointless, you have no idea where you are and decide to retrace your steps.
You get lost wandering in the forest.
This network of caves is seemingly never ending, somehow you manage to eventually find a way out, but you get the feeling that there's still something down there...
Item lost
An object belonging to one of the crew has been lost.{fight_prevented_by_item}
A strange being is trying to communicate with you, inspecting you all closely before taking the {equipment} belonging to {character} and runs (sic!) off on its huge hind legs.
Return
You abandon the current expedition.{fight_prevented_by_item}
A violent tremor paralyses the expedition... And then silence again... best return to the Daedalus quick smart!
With a muted groan, a nearby volcano starts to belch thick black smoke, you book it back to the Daedalus as fast as you can!
The expedition observes a Mankarog on the horizon passing behind a mountain... We should definitely change heading now to avoid any trouble.
MIA
A team member has gotten lost.{fight_prevented_by_item}
These fields are a real maze... OK, there's nothing to see here, let's go. Has anyone seen {character} ?
The forest is so dense that it is difficult to stay in a group. After an hour's walk... {character} is nowhere to be seen.
Nightmare... {character} has fallen into the water. That makes things a shade more complicated...
As the wind picks up, the snow begins to fall. The sky disappears immediately under a thick white veil and you lose sight of {character}. Typical!
Reunited
A lost teammate has been found!{fight_prevented_by_item}
Dead
A lost team member dies.{fight_prevented_by_item}

You have found {character} under a rock, and it doesn't look good. No movement at all. Aaaand, no signs of respiration. Looks like the guys down the lab are going to tell you that it's game over for this comrade...
